name: List reactions for a commit comment

params.name: content
params.description: Returns a single [reaction type](/v3/reactions/#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a commit comment.

description: List the reactions to a [commit comment](/v3/repos/comments/).

name: Create reaction for a commit comment

params.name: content
params.description: The [reaction type](/v3/reactions/#reaction-types) to add to the commit comment.

description: Create a reaction to a [commit comment](/v3/repos/comments/). A response with a `Status: 200 OK` means that you already added the reaction type to this commit comment.

params.name: content
params.description: Returns a single [reaction type](/v3/reactions/#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to an issue.

name: Create reaction for an issue

params.name: content
params.description: The [reaction type](/v3/reactions/#reaction-types) to add to the issue.

description: Create a reaction to an [issue](/v3/issues/). A response with a `Status: 200 OK` means that you already added the reaction type to this issue.

name: List reactions for an issue comment

params.name: content
params.description: Returns a single [reaction type](/v3/reactions/#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to an issue comment.

description: List the reactions to an [issue comment](/v3/issues/comments/).

name: Create reaction for an issue comment

params.name: content
params.description: The [reaction type](/v3/reactions/#reaction-types) to add to the issue comment.

description: Create a reaction to an [issue comment](/v3/issues/comments/). A response with a `Status: 200 OK` means that you already added the reaction type to this issue comment.

name: List reactions for a pull request review comment

params.name: content
params.description: Returns a single [reaction type](/v3/reactions/#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a pull request review comment.

description: List the reactions to a [pull request review comment](/v3/pulls/comments/).

name: Create reaction for a pull request review comment

params.name: content
params.description: The [reaction type](/v3/reactions/#reaction-types) to add to the pull request review comment.

description: Create a reaction to a [pull request review comment](/v3/pulls/comments/). A response with a `Status: 200 OK` means that you already added the reaction type to this pull request review comment.

name: List reactions for a team discussion

params.name: content
params.description: Returns a single [reaction type](/v3/reactions/#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a team discussion.

description: List the reactions to a [team discussion](/v3/teams/discussions/). OAuth access tokens require the `read:discussion` [scope](/apps/building-oauth-apps/scopes-for-oauth-apps/).

name: Create reaction for a team discussion

params.name: content
params.description: The [reaction type](/v3/reactions/#reaction-types) to add to the team discussion.

description: Create a reaction to a [team discussion](/v3/teams/discussions/). OAuth access tokens require the `read:discussion` [scope](/apps/building-oauth-apps/scopes-for-oauth-apps/). A response with a `Status: 200 OK` means that you already added the reaction type to this team discussion.

name: List reactions for a team discussion comment

params.name: content
params.description: Returns a single [reaction type](/v3/reactions/#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a team discussion comment.

description: List the reactions to a [team discussion comment](/v3/teams/discussion_comments/). OAuth access tokens require the `read:discussion` [scope](/apps/building-oauth-apps/scopes-for-oauth-apps/).

name: Create reaction for a team discussion comment

params.name: content
params.description: The [reaction type](/v3/reactions/#reaction-types) to add to the team discussion comment.

description: Create a reaction to a [team discussion comment](/v3/teams/discussion_comments/). OAuth access tokens require the `read:discussion` [scope](/apps/building-oauth-apps/scopes-for-oauth-apps/). A response with a `Status: 200 OK` means that you already added the reaction type to this team discussion comment.

name: Delete a reaction
description: OAuth access tokens require the `read:discussion` [scope](/apps/building-oauth-apps/scopes-for-oauth-apps/), when deleting a [team discussion](/v3/teams/discussions/) or [team discussion comment](/v3/teams/discussion_comments/).
